title: Bug 6304: Cannot sync a .java file and another resource
OB: When attempting to synchronize a .java file and another resource (e.g., a .properties file) in the package viewer, the synchronization process fails or encounters errors.
EB: The synchronization process should successfully update both the .java file and the associated resource, ensuring that both files are in sync with each other.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Open the package viewer.
2. Select a .java file and another resource file (e.g., a .properties file) in the package viewer.
